Title: 41133 - # Ways to Add Adventure to Your Life
Direction: 675 words. Make a list of four to eight ways regular people can add more adventure to their lives. You can include simple things like hosting theme parties or visiting places in town the reader hasn't been to before, but you can also include bigger things like taking vacations overseas or choosing a new career. You can mention the client link and keyword by mentioning working with Amway as an opportunity to get away from the 9 to 5 lifestyle so readers can do more things spontaneously during the day. Your target audience is interested in topics like lifestyle, travel, etc.
